results.title: The Influence of Simvastatin on NGAL, Matrix Metalloproteinases and Their Tissue Inhibitors in Human Intraluminal Thrombus and Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Tissue.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The study was designed to analyse gene expression and protein concentration of MMPs, TIMPs, and @GENE_LCN2 @GENE_3934 @@@NGAL@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Familial_Abdominal_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565230 @@@AAA@@@ walls and intraluminal thrombi (ILTs) of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (n = 10) and not on statins (n = 10).

citations.NLM: Piechota-Polanczyk A, Demyanets S, Mittlboeck M, Hofmann M, Domenig CM, Neumayer C, Wojta J, Klinger M, Nanobachvili J, Huk I. The Influence of Simvastatin on NGAL, Matrix Metalloproteinases and Their Tissue Inhibitors in Human Intraluminal Thrombus and Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Tissue. Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg. 2015 May;49(5):549-55. PMID: 25800096
